DOC.brief_summary: This observational study patient POAG OHT collect data use Lumigan® 0.01 % ( bimatoprost 0.01 % ophthalmic solution ) routine clinical setting . Patients see baseline follow-up visit approximately 8-12 week baseline , per normal clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Lumigan® 0.01 % Treatment Primary Open Angle Glaucoma ( POAG ) Ocular Hypertension ( OHT )
